chapter.title: Frank the Goat
chapter.para: So what's the story behind the goat?

Back when Brad was living in the dorms and was also still running a site named FreeVote.com
Later, FreeVote was run by one of Brad's friends for a while.
his roommate Eli and him got bored and decided to make some joke ads to put up on FreeVote.com to advertise &ljcom;.
Those original 8 banners, as much as they sucked, are archived for historical reasons at .

After the first four they had both run out of ideas and one of them just spouted out, &ljcom;… because goats are cool. It made no sense, so it was perfect! Then Brad went and found a picture of a goat. That goat then became the unofficial &lj; mascot.
So basically, the goat means nothing. But he's so damn cool, and über sexy.
